summary.title: Coffee Ordering Web App
summary.description: The Brew & Bloom Coffee Co. ordering web application is a digital platform designed to enhance the customer experience and streamline internal operations of the coffee shop. More specifically, it is designed to provide a convenient online for customers to browse the menu, customize, and place orders for pickup or delivery, and to equip staff with tools for efficient order and menu management.
